job.description:
Grade
(
relevant for internal applicants only
): 11
S&P Global Platts is seeking a Sr Software Engineering to work with technical leadership for all stages of software design, development and maintenance of Platts and Realtime Platform
What You Can Expect
The ideal candidate must be have strong technical skills and speak to the technical architecture and collaborate with engineering teams.
Responsibilities
Ensuring the appropriate use of standard models and software packages, standard methods of integration, as well as, the development of common application services.
Partner with customer-facing peers to create and deliver on roadmaps. This includes participating in planning processes, defining a technical solution, establishing and implementing applications based on architecture direction
Mentor teams, innovate and experiment, give face to business ideas and present to key stakeholders
Ensure that best development processes and technologies are used in the design, construction of these platforms
Ensure stability and performance of existing and future enhancements through use of applicable profiling and testing methodologies
Ensures timely delivery of the development projects without compromising quality and performance of the system
Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related discipline
Strong problem solving, logic, and analytical skills
7+ years’ experience in software development
6+ years of experience in Application Development using
Java/ Spring boot and or
.Net
Strong command in JavaScript-frameworks (React), C#
Experience working in agile scrum/kanban teams and related agile processes
Hands on experience on containerization using
Docker
Ability to collaborate and brainstorm in a team environment
Experience with large scale cloud-based architecture is a must
Experience building cloud native applications using microservices and cloud deployment
Experience in building message based distributed, scalable & resilient systems
Knowledge in AWS Cloud Services (IAM,VPC, ELB ,API Gateway, S3, EKS, CloudWatch) plus
Knowledge in CI/CD process using Jenkins, Kubernetes plus
Experience with
Realtime Streaming technologies a huge plus
S&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $83,200 to $190,100. Base salary ranges may vary by geographic location.
In addition to base compensation, this role is eligible for an annual incentive plan.
